title: How to Set Up Automated Maintenance Reminders
description: Generate recurring revenue by reminding customers when it's time for service.
requirements: A list of customers and their service dates
A reminder system (email, calendar, or CRM)

steps.title: Identify recurring maintenance needs
steps.description: What services do customers need regularly?
substeps: HVAC: Seasonal tune-ups (spring AC, fall heating)
Plumbing: Annual water heater flush
Landscaping: Seasonal services (aeration, fertilization)
Painting: Exterior touch-up every 5-7 years
List your recurring services and their intervals
steps.tip: Focus on services customers forget about but genuinely need.

steps.title: Build your customer maintenance calendar
steps.description: Track when each customer needs reminders.
substeps: Create a spreadsheet: Customer | Service | Last Done | Next Due
Add your recent customers and their last service dates
Calculate Next Due based on your recommended interval
Or use your CRM's recurring job feature

steps.title: Set up reminder emails
substeps: Option 1: Google Calendar reminders for yourself to reach out
Option 2: Mailchimp automation (free tier) for email campaigns
Option 3: Jobber/HouseCall Pro automated reminders
Set reminders 2-4 weeks before service is due

steps.title: Write reminder templates
steps.description: Create messages for each service type.
substeps: Use ChatGPT: 'Write a friendly reminder email that it's time for [service type]. Include why it matters and a call-to-action to book.'
Keep it short — 3-4 sentences
Include a direct booking link or phone number
Make scheduling easy: 'Reply to this email' or 'Call/text [number]'
steps.tip: Example: 'Hi [Name]! It's been 6 months since your last HVAC tune-up. Fall is coming — let's make sure your furnace is ready. Reply to schedule your service!'

steps.title: Track and follow up
substeps: Note who schedules and who doesn't
Send a follow-up to non-responders after 1 week
Try text if email doesn't work
Track your conversion rate: How many reminders turn into jobs?

successMessage: You now have a maintenance reminder system! This creates predictable recurring revenue.
proTips: Maintenance customers are easier to keep than new customers are to find
Offer a small discount for booking annual maintenance in advance
Send reminders from a person, not a business — 'Hi, it's Mike from [Business]'
